entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the one who shouted at Harry. He is described as having an empty pocket.

entities.name: ted
entities.description: Ted is introduced as the one who helped Harry by giving him his wand back.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who shouted at Hagrid and was given his wand back.

entities.name: mrs. tonks
entities.description: Mrs. Tonks is introduced as the wife of Ted and has a resemblance to her sister Bellatrix.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as the sister of Mrs. Tonks.

relationships.description: Ted gave his wand back to Harry.
